root.str: Further improve the Magrider's strafe speed, reverse speed, braking power and hover power.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Gold Prowler Hood Ornament.
Adds a cosmetic attachment to your ANT. NC use only.
Apply the Hyper camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Chrome Venril Sathir Hood Ornament.

Interested in ambushing enemies from unexpected locations? That was a rhetorical question, soldier, of course you are! Now strap on your jetpack and report to the nearest battle zone as a Light Assault. Remember: strike hard, strike fast.



Must be Light Assault to complete objectives.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Flash to 9 minutes.
Are you sure you wish to continue?
Apply the Amoeba camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Revenge is sweet, but why stop there? NC use only.
Use redeploy to quickly return to the shooting range from anywhere in VR Training.
Increasing this slider to the right will increase joystick sensitivity. (Default: 1.25)
Improves the top speed of the vehicle in both cruising and afterburner modes.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Lightning by 60 seconds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Festive Drone:</font> Searching databanks for Kachi Kantata, poet. Zero results. Representative Ayla has repeatedly received similar results. Records indicate that Field Officer Knightly may be knowledgable on such a subject.

A warden of the New Conglomerate, Hadley, has been in search of a comfortable, if archaic, legwear known as "denim." Consult with Representative Nalla of Nascent Expeditions, an organization known to trade in various commodities.
Improved speed and acceleration. (More effective than previous rank)
This object may not be deployed fully submerged
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 27.
Killing enemy MAX units will restore 650 health. <font color="#dc9c36">MAX only.</font>
Get the most popular Mosquito weapons at a discounted price!

Unlocks the Noxious Field ability for the Combat Medic. VS only.

Creates a toxic field that inflicts 100 damage per second to organic enemy targets in a 7 meter radius around the Combat Medic. Lasts up to 7 seconds.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Use the Jump Pad to Reach the Nearby Tower
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> This lab must have been abandoned when the facility flooded, however I don't see any way out. Where are the researchers?
Equipped with a combination chevron/crosshair reticle and 3.4x magnification capabilities, the TR's Designated Marksman Optics functions well at many ranges.
Players who kill seven enemies in a single spawn automatically have a bounty placed on their head. Stop their kill streak to collect the bounty.

The IO-10 by InfilOptics is a favorite among sharpshooters due to its 10x magnification and easy-to-use mil-dot reticle.

Hold Sprint to steady aim.

<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Nalla:</font> Welcome to Nascent Expeditions, operative. We've recently entered into an agreement with Nanite Systems to help with the eventual reconstruction of Esamir. While the details of the contract are currently sealed, you are on our contact list per Representative Foster's request.
Hello, operative. I have been told that you are to engage in subterfuge assignments alongside normal combat operations with your assigned team.

<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Ayla has a Neutralizer Device available for you. Use this device to reactivate the nanomachines and reclaim a vehicle. Then pilot it to your Warpgate, or Eisa Tech Plant, if your faction has claim to it.
Improves the ability of the Prowler to manuever in combat by improving rotation speed, brake power, and reverse speed.
Customize your Flash with this violet antenna ball. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 10 rounds.
There is no stun setting on this powerful photon sidearm, and is an intimidating asset both on-world and off. All factions can use NS weapons.

This rack of anti-air missiles lock onto enemy aircraft, unleashing a barrage of four havoc warheads. On impact, mechanical targets will be affected by a destabilizing field that prevents them from being repaired for up to 6 seconds. NC use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> "Yeeehaaaawwww space cowman!" I knew you'd make it, never doubted you for a moment.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 14 missiles.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 24 rockets.
The vehicle containing the messages was lost! You will have to start over.
Weapon mount on the front of the Javelin.
Failed to set the squad leader.

<font color="#00FFAA">Coordinator Tolland:</font> Hey, kid. We know a few things about Oshur from our surveys. It's got stretches of pristine beaches. Rippling crystal-blue waters as far as the eye can see. And an abundance of rich Cortium veins through it all.
Light Assault: Deal a total of 50,000 damage
The E540 Halberd fires 85 mm armor-piercing rockets. VS use only.
Apply the Plasma camo pattern to your armor. TR use only.

Reduces your passive shield recharge delay by 1 second, and whenever your shield breaks, your sprint speed is increased by 20% for 6 seconds and you heal for 150 health over the same duration. Taking damage will remove the added sprint speed. <font color="#dc9c36">12 second cooldown after triggering.</font>

The last chapter of Campaign 01 has begun!

  • Containment Sites are a new facility type on Esamir that contains a vast underground complex.

  • The Campaign Vendor has received new items to unlock or purchase using Campaign Currency.

  • The frigid wastes of Esamir has also received improvements based on feedback.
Reduces the reuse timer of the Radar Scrambler.
Next Rank: Regeneration delay caused by damage lowered to 9 seconds.
Acquire schematics from an enemy Tech Plant
Could not set fireteam flag at this time.
Adds spectral cosmetic propulsion effects to this vehicle. VS use only.

A new off-world Warpgate has been discovered emitting a faint Vanu signal and we must be the first to claim it. The immense amount of power required to stabilize the connection, even for a short time, can only be drawn from a Containment Site. Soldiers have been enlisted to reroute power in the facility while our technicians calibrate their systems.
Celebrate the early access release of PlanetSide: Arena with these special, Arena themed items!
You qualify for a Double Daybreak Cash deal - 4000 DBC for $20!
Apply the Snakeskin camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.

Not every vehicle can be hurt by small arms fire; If you aren't seeing a hit indicator, then you are not dealing damage. You will need anti-vehicle weapons in those situations.Tanks take a little more damage when hitting them from the side and take a lot more damage when hitting them from the rear.
Pinning this Mission will un-pin your currently tracked Mission. Are you sure?
Very few weapons are able to touch the Lynx's incredible rate of fire. Featuring a cyclic rate of 909 RPM, the LC2 Lynx tears through infantry at close to medium range.
This Vehicle Terminal was destroyed during the battle. Use the Engineer's Repair Tool to restore its functionality.
Apply the Starburst camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
Love Free in the NC Vehicle Decal
Apply the Carbonation camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
Increases magazine size by 5 rounds, but increases hipfire cone of fire by 20%.

A festive purple cap woven with Auraxium fibers.
(No XP Boost)

This item is only usable during the winter holiday season.
Today Only! Solid Dark Brown Camo Available!
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon or sidearm will restock 15% of your primary and secondary weapon magazines for free.
Increases the power of the deployment shield by 90%.
Increases the power of the Nanite Proximity Repair System by 400%.
Your friend request for [*player*] has timed out.
Always remember - you're New Conglomerate - that means you're fighting for more than just some facility. Good luck down there.
Summer is here with some limited time sales on special items.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.
Increases xp gain by 50% and squad xp gain by 5% for 7 days. Boost can only be used on this character.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 missiles.

No longer appeased by the stumbling technological advances of Nanite Systems, Praetor Umatherin of the Vanu Sovereignty makes an ardent maneuver to discover the truth. Conquer the continent of Esamir and uncover the truth buried benath the warpgate.
Allows LMGs to be used in the secondary weapon slot. Does not include Directive reward weapons. Heavy Assault only.
Contains a Phaseshift VX-S plus 1000 Certs
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1350 rounds.
Apply the Clover camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Apply the Delta camo pattern to your armor. All factions can use this gear.
Gold Smiley Face Dead Hood Ornament
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 27 rockets.
Next Rank: Increase reload speed bonus to 36%.
It seems you're ready to share our truth once again. Use the Warpgate Terminal to return to the planet's surface. Speak to the Field Commander once you arrive.
Check out the latest weaponry from Nanite Systems!
Adds white chassis lights to the under carriage of the Prowler. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 100 rockets.
<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Good job. Pack it up here and get back to Foster on Sanctuary when you're ready for more.

Greetings recruit. On the battlefield we'll track your experience gain, and increase your battle rank as appropriate. More importantly, you'll be also be awarded <font color="#00F0FF">Certification Points</font> that you can use to unlock or upgrade equipment.
All Battle Cash Purchases Unlock for Your Entire Account!*
Increases magazine size by 50 rounds by streamlining the ammunition placement and feeding, and slows your reload speed by 0.325 seconds.
<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> Proceed to Esamir and begin peparations to repair the newly constructed facility.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 6.25%
NC - Pistol - Mid - V6 Description(Delete Me -BB)

A festive red cap woven with Auraxium fibers.
+50% xp when worn
This item is only usable during the winter holiday season.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 10 rockets.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.12 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 shells.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 16 shells.
(VS)(Sunderer) Reduces Damage taken from mines by 50% and other attacks from the bottom of the vehicle by 25%
Unlock the Rocky Tundra camo pattern for your armor, weapons and vehicles. All factions can use this gear.
Earn kills as a Light Assault.
Apply the Carbon Fiber camo pattern to your weapon. TR use only.
You're getting benefits and helping the Devs AT THE SAME TIME. Whoa.
While cloaked the infiltrator can sprint faster, but will take 70% more damage
Press NUMPAD-4 (default) to voice chat with nearby players of the same faction.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 6.25%
Creates a long lasting smoke screen around the Sunderer that disrupts visibility and lock-ons for 8 seconds.
Unlock the NSX Tengu SMG with a full complement of attachments. All factions can use NS weapons.
No-deploy zone area map tint color
A spawn unit is back online.
On a headshot kill, instantly restore 165 shield.
<font color="#00FFAA">Ayla:</font> Now! Initiate the Bio Lab's self-destruct sequence and that's the last we'll see of those meat grinders.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 rockets.
May the winds be at your back with this air vehicle bundle. Bundle contains cross-faction equivalents of all items.

<font color="#00FFAA">Field Officer Knightly</font> Foster wouldn't approve, but we're authorizing you to dismantle enemy constructs at these Staging Sites. We agree with the need to build them, but we want OUR empire to do the protecting.

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Were you ever stationed on Oshur before the war? Sometimes it's hard to remember what life was like before all this. With the daily scientific discoveries in farming, medicine, or technology.
You were unable to place an order, because you have exceeded the monthly limit.
Allows the squad leader to call in an artillery bombardment from the TR's headquarters.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 80 missiles.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 788 rounds.
Esamir Munitions Corp's Mammoth EMC11 features low, controllable recoil, giving it an advantage for long distance fire.
You were kicked from the squad.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Gold Skull Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 7.5%
Premium Member: +300% Passive Cert Point Gain

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> Hey, you just missed Foster. Said he had some stuff to deal with back at headquarters. Before he left though, he gave me some coordinates and said it was a gift for all your hard work.
The Hydra VA45's high rate of fire quickly goes through both enemy infantry and power cores.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 96 rounds.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
艾美瑞什: Capture and Hold 04
Be sure to read the descriptions of your abilities and equipment in the loadout screen as they contain important information!

The Mammoth fires heavy tank rounds that can be enhanced with the MAD device. When the vehicle deploys, the cannon will transform into the Skylance anti-air turret which fires piercing blasts able to strike multiple targets.
Uses the MAX's fully charged capacitor to temporarily supercharge their movement servos, allowing the user to mount an assault or quickly dash to cover
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 500 rounds.
Increases the Idle Timer on the Prowler to 21 minutes.
Wearable by Infiltrator. NC use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 rounds.
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Chrome Tiger Fins. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 128 rounds.
Adds 6 rounds to the default magazine size.

The treaties may have permitted the empires to establish footholds on Oshur without firing a single shot, but everyone knows that the carnage started two minutes after. With the battle for Oshur now fully underway, it's time to move to the front lines and fight for the highest bidder!
Customize your aircraft with these sleek Chrome Razor Fins. All factions can use this gear.
Increase Heavy Rail Beam Ammo Capacity
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 220 rounds.
Increases resource gain by 50% for 3 days. Boost can only be used on this character.
NC Patriot Flare Gun Auraxium Medal
Apply the single use 艾美瑞什 Scrub camo pattern to your weapon. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Apply the Flame camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only.
The Combat Medic and Engineer classes can gain XP through healing, reviving, repairing, and giving ammo to their teammates.

<font color="#00FFAA">Tolland:</font> Anticipating high demand on this resource, we are providing incentives for soldiers to climb aboard their Advanced Nanite Transport vehicle and harvest Cortium near the front lines.
Unlock the chapter and embark on %0.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 missiles.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Gold Forest Giant Hood Ornament.
Single Use African Forest Weapon Camo
The straight-pull bolt allows the sniper to chamber another round while aiming down sights.
The Magrider M12 Kobalt is a .50 cal machine gun that is effective against infantry targets. VS use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> That should free up enough power to enable the display on the emergency vehicle bay.
Deliver information to the allied warpgate without dying or redeploying.
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Sunderer by 15%.
Capture and hold all 3 Biolabs on Indar
Contains a Vortex VM21 plus 1000 Certs
Wearable by all non-Max classes. NC use only.
Weapon mount on the roof towards the rear of the Sunderer. Operated by the passenger in seat 3.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Galaxy down to 8 minutes.
A laser sight increases the user's hipfire accuracy by 33%.
Improved speed and acceleration. (More effective than previous rank)
Wearable by all non-Max classes. VS use only.
Apply the Forest Greyscale camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Decreases the time needed to reload weapon by 8.75%
While piloting a Galaxy or Valkyrie, travel more than 5,000m with at least 2 passengers.
Only leaders of squads or platoons with more than 2 members can issue situation reports.
Attaches a 3.25x optical zoom to your weapon.
The Anniversary Edition of the combat medic's Medical Applicator.
TR - Pistol - Mid - V8 Description(Delete Me -BB)
Adds 25 rounds to the default magazine size.
When assaulting a player-made base, infantry strike teams should be sent in to disable enemy modules that may be shielding or repairing the base.
Apply the Stripe camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Knightly</font> Remind the blue and purple who owns this planet, crush our enemies.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 200 rounds.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Rank 25 Hood Ornament. TR use only.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.075 seconds.
All non-MAX infantry classes have a layer of shielding that will regenerate when they've not taken damage for a while.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 18 rounds.
Think someone is hacking? Use the /report command.
This customization adds a broken glass decal to the Liberator's cockpit.
Applies a decal to your armor. NC use only.
Increases the lifespan of the Ammunition Pack to 4 minutes; also increases the radius in which the pack will resupply ammo to 5 meters.
Charges the Implant Power Module with 24000 energy.
Adds 12 rounds to the default magazine size.
There are a limited number of "Victory Cores" available on each continent. These cores power HIVEs. Destroying an enemy HIVE will steal their core and give it to your faction!
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 4 rockets.
For experienced soldiers who have been battling since Beta.
Improves the top speed and acceleration of the Sunderer.
Celebrate PlanetSide 2's fourth anniversary with this mega bundle. Provides items for all 3 Empires! Note: the Heroic Boost is only provided to one character.
Customize your Flash with this white blinking antenna ball. VS use only.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> Construct an Elysium Refinery near these crystals, and break them down with your mining laser. The Refinery will do the rest of the work.
Allows 3 additional grenades of any type to be carried.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 72 rounds.
艾美瑞什 Bloom Armor Decal
Pull a Sunderer from the Vehicle Terminal
You must be lower than Battle Rank 15 to enter Koltyr.
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 84 rounds.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 19 shells.

Reduces your passive shield recharge delay by 1 second, and whenever your shield breaks, your sprint speed is increased by 20% for 6 seconds. Taking damage will remove the added sprint speed. <font color="#dc9c36">12 second cooldown after triggering.</font>

Adds 5 rounds to the default magazine size.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.075 seconds.
Further increases the strength of Nanoweave Armor.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 160 rounds.
Answer a few questions and receive starter gear for the class of your choice!
Decreases muzzle flash and audio range.
Improves how well the Harasser performs when off roading by increasing handling and hill climbing.
Attaches a 2x optical zoom to your weapon.
Cannot equip two of the same item.
Increases the repair speed of the Nano-Armor Kit by 33%; also increases the overheat threshold to 13.5 seconds.
Acquire a Galaxy from a vehicle terminal.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 15 shots.
Automated turret that provides ample fire-and-forget base defense

<font color="#00FFAA">Facilitator Campner:</font> Greetings operative, we appreciate your interest in this mission. I have been told to direct you to the marked Containment Site on Esamir. Please proceed to Esamir via the warp terminal. I will brief you further upon arrival at the facility.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 15 rounds.
The E540 Halberd fires 85 mm armor-piercing rockets. TR use only.
As an Engineer, repair allied MAX suits.

<font color="#00FFAA">Hadley:</font> Apparently the islands are surrounded by a massive energy barrier? And since the TR blockheads couldn't force their way through, they had to contract Nascent Expeditions to think for them. And that's great for us!
Applies a decal to your armor. TR use only.

Activate to passively reload your weapons for 9 seconds. Can be activated once every 52 seconds.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 8.75%
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.3 seconds.
Brimming with experimental systems this heavy duty plating was developed for use in vacuums and hazardous zones: allowing vanu soldiers to spread enlightenment to even the harshest environments
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> As I suspected, there looks to be leftover Stormglider Drones in the storage lockers. We can activate one of these within the storm to gather telemetry.
Redeploy, Squad Deploy, and Join Combat can be accessed at any time.
Increases the amount of IFF Devices held at a single time
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 7.5%

Supporting our front line depends on the supplies our convoys can deliver. These convoys need protection so they're not picked off in transit. That's where you come in. Stay close to our convoys as they leave the Warpgate and gun down any threats that try to get close.

Unlocks the BEC Ammunition for the NS-03 Thumper heavy weapon. This munition slows the movement, reload, and firing speed of affected targets in exchange for reduced damage on impact. <font color="#dc9c36">This item expires at the end of the Campaign.</font>
Adds 1 round to the default magazine size.
Contains a Reaper DMR plus 1000 Certs

<font color="#00FFAA">Tolland:</font> Which is why I am pleased to announce that you have been automatically re-certified to use the NE-11 PML, the tactical personal mining laser that... I see you already have equipped. Please proceed to the nearest dig site.
The Colossus Heavy Tank's shield bubble is powered by Cortium. ANTs can resupply the Colossus to keep it protected.

While there was no silver or gold at the end of the treasure hunt, the existence of what looks like a flooded military research facility should pique your superiors' interest. Who was using it? What were they using it for? And how long will it be until they return to claim what was left behind?
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.45 seconds.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 15%
<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Foster:</font> Despite our united efforts, Esamir is still very much a combat zone. Please secure transportation and head to The Shattered Warpgate.
[*player*] has already been invited to the outfit.
Additional composite plating to complement the look of your soldier.
Are you sure you do not want to refund your Certification Points spent on skills?
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Chrome Flames Hood Ornament. All factions can use this gear.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 4.17% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "5" Gold Hood Ornament.
Customize your soldier's voice with this Smooth Voice Pack. TR Female use only.
Apply the single use Indar Canyons v2 camo pattern to your weapon. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Dismantle enemy constructs near The Shattered Warpgate.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 1350 rounds.
Awarded for mastery of the Mosquito, this Auraxium-infused Lumifiber trim proves its owner's command over the skies.
The Campion has earned a sinister reputation on the battlefield after seeing extensive use by Stalker Infiltrators during its initial rollout.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "Z" Gold Hood Ornament.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 6 bombs.
Lyra's open diamond reflex sight gives Sovereignty soldiers clear vision on close range targets without reducing awareness of flanking threats.
Adds 20 rounds to the default magazine size.
Your payment comes in the form of Certification Points. Certs will get you gear upgrades, and let you purchase new toys. And by toys, I mean guns.
Repel cheesy pickup lines with this limited time mega sale bundle!

The haunted version of this helmet only materializes during the Halloween Event, providing a spooky 15% XP boost while worn. Once the event comes to a grisly end, this item vanishes into the abyss from whence it spawned until next Halloween!
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a Chrome Lightning Hood Ornament.
Apply the Diced camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Galaxy down to 5 minutes.

Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
The MAX locks down, becoming resistant to damage, but lowering its damage.
So there's some disabled New Conglomerate vehicles on Esamir, they're buried in the snow and charged with some of that weird ancient energy.
Increases the hill climbing ability of the Lightning by 5%.
Adds this customization to your vehicle. Only VS can use this gear.
Adds 5 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 80 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Warden Hadley:</font> The Vanus and Terrans are out there, likely trying to accomplish the same things we are. Don't let them beat you to any of these missions. Take them out first.

Legacy implant, no longer functional.Receive HUD notifications when an enemy has spotted you.

Tier 4 implant.
MAX units can equip.
Recover a disabled Valkyrie, Galaxy, or Sunderer

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> While construction efforts for the new facilities are ongoing, control of these locations offers benefits to our cause. Expel our enemies, and retain oversight at the Staging Sites.
Apply the single use Esamir Snow camo pattern to your vehicle. NC use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Customize your Prowler with Scout Plating. TR use only.
Banner frame reward for bronze winners of Outfit War Alpha Cycle 03.
Allows cortium to be used to construct a module that, when powered, protects against aerial bombardment and infantry drops. Structures in range will gain resistance to orbital strike damage.
Orphaned - Post Launch - Do not translate. Mosquito Inertial Dampener - Level 5
Utility Pouches allow the engineer to carry and place more deployables.
Apply the single use Northern Forest camo pattern to your vehicle. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the rotation speed of the Prowler by 7 degrees/second.
Adds 25 rounds to the default magazine size.
Increases the amount of ammunition in each magazine by 4 rounds.
While active, the Transport Cloak drains the ANT's stored Cortium in exchange for limited invisibility. Consumes 150 Cortium per second.
Contains the platinum NS-44P Commissioner, usable by all factions, and the VS specific Beamer VS3-FB.
Gravity pads will move you up and down quickly. Step on the pad and you will ascend or descend in the direction of the flowing particles.
This makes you invuln to damage for 1 hour
